Package game.trading

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Tradeable
    An interface that specifies methods required for trading
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    FingerReaderEnia  
    MerchantKale
    Merchant Kale, who is an extension of the Trader abstract class.
    TradeableItemWrapper
    A wrapper for items so that they can be traded Implements the Tradeable interface
    TradeableWeaponWrapper
    A wrapper for weapon items so that they can be traded.
    Trader
    Actor that can buy and sell weapons to/from the player.
